content: take a walk through the woods in winter you can feel the snow falling on your cheeks and if you look out through the trees you will see the beautiful mountains in the distance this is the third of three stockings in my into the woods series the other two designs available are into the woods - cabin 1 and into the woods - truck 2 this pattern is an ***intermediate*** level pattern and can be a bit challenging one round requires carrying three 3 strands also you will need to know how to do duplicate stitch the pattern includes a picture tutorial on making duplicate stitches **warning ** there are long yarn floats in this stocking be sure to review ways to handle long floats so that you are comfortable working with this pattern **cascade 220 colors used approximate yardage ** forest green #8267 115 yds ruby #9404 15 yds antiqued heather #9600 145 yds sunflower #2415 5 yds *this pattern has been tech edited * 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/into-the-woods---cabin 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/into-the-woods---truck
